Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

::Kaiser/The Dragoon::
       Kaiser shrugs and turns away from both of them sulking slightly.  He 
mumbles quietly to himself.  "I thought my way was better, bah."

       The unknown bot turns to face the seemingly sane Synergy.  His 
expression is unreadable and the air around his body seems to shimmer 
slightly.  When he speaks there are two voices speaking almost as an echo.  
"We are The Dragoon.  We live to serve, but we have no master.  Guide us to 
your commander."

--part1_f5.2c6acb60.2be024af_boundary
